verification.payload:
tree 1217178251378f6e4f5dcc099d4a31d9a9a902d9
parent 03858b23fe1d17e681eb18d24602b276020295a0
author Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1550754033 +0100
committer Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1559814616 +0200

[build] detect std::system or ::wsystem

files.patch:
@@ -925,6 +925,29 @@ if test x$use_reduce_exports = xyes; then
   [AC_MSG_ERROR([Cannot set default symbol visibility. Use --disable-reduce-exports.])])
 fi
 
+AC_MSG_CHECKING([for std::system])
+AC_LINK_IFELSE(
+    [ AC_LANG_PROGRAM(
+        [[ #include <cstdlib> ]],
+        [[ int nErr = std::system(""); ]]
+    )],
+    [ AC_MSG_RESULT(yes); AC_DEFINE(HAVE_STD__SYSTEM, 1, Define to 1 if you have the `std::system' function.)],
+    [ AC_MSG_RESULT(no) ]
+)
+
+AC_MSG_CHECKING([for ::_wsystem])
+AC_LINK_IFELSE(
+    [ AC_LANG_PROGRAM(
+        [[ ]],
+        [[ int nErr = ::_wsystem(""); ]]
+    )],
+    [ AC_MSG_RESULT(yes); AC_DEFINE(HAVE_WSYSTEM, 1, Define to 1 if you have the `::wsystem' function.)],
+    [ AC_MSG_RESULT(no) ]
+)
+
+# Define to 1 if std::system or ::wsystem (Windows) is available
+AC_DEFINE([HAVE_SYSTEM], [HAVE_STD__SYSTEM || HAVE_WSYSTEM], [HAVE_WSYSTEM])
+
 LEVELDB_CPPFLAGS=
 LIBLEVELDB=
 LIBMEMENV=

commit.message: [build] MSVC: set HAVE_SYSTEM for desktop apps

verification.payload:
tree e4f8c45e12bc4cdb90c9b5def3a80b910eabd45a
parent c1c91bb78d7267f01ee3a3c156c218b46a92cd39
author Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1552643015 +0100
committer Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1559814616 +0200

[build] MSVC: set HAVE_SYSTEM for desktop apps

files.patch:
@@ -421,4 +421,14 @@
 /* Define for large files, on AIX-style hosts. */
 /* #undef _LARGE_FILES */
 
+/* Windows Universal Platform constraints */
+#if !defined(WINAPI_FAMILY) || (WINAPI_FAMILY == WINAPI_FAMILY_DESKTOP_APP)
+/* Either a desktop application without API restrictions, or and older system
+   before these macros were defined. */
+
+/* ::wsystem is available */
+#define HAVE_SYSTEM 1
+
+#endif // !WINAPI_FAMILY || WINAPI_FAMILY_DESKTOP_APP
+
 #endif //BITCOIN_BITCOIN_CONFIG_H

commit.message:
[build]: check std::system for -[alert|block|wallet]notify

Platforms such as iOs do not support launching a process
through system().

verification.payload:
tree 26a3b6fc73c55d01cf1bbba8c00347529ae76d0b
parent cc3ad56ff2bc2583fe68c4a9e0b41072a47c0b07
author Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1552559437 +0100
committer Sjors Provoost <sjors@sprovoost.nl> 1559814866 +0200

[build]: check std::system for -[alert|block|wallet]notify

Platforms such as iOs do not support launching a process
through system().

files.patch:
@@ -946,7 +946,7 @@ AC_LINK_IFELSE(
 )
 
 # Define to 1 if std::system or ::wsystem (Windows) is available
-AC_DEFINE([HAVE_SYSTEM], [HAVE_STD__SYSTEM || HAVE_WSYSTEM], [HAVE_WSYSTEM])
+AC_DEFINE([HAVE_SYSTEM], [HAVE_STD__SYSTEM || HAVE_WSYSTEM], [std::system or ::wsystem])
 
 LEVELDB_CPPFLAGS=
 LIBLEVELDB=
